text:
Vanessa Proux (31 May 1974) is a French biologist and the current head of Sup'Biotech.
Holder of a Master's degree in biochemistry (1997) and one more in microbiology, Vanessa Proux graduates from University of Technology of Compiègne in October 2001 (Doctorate in microbiology). During 4 years, she is teacher and researcher.
Since February 2004, she is head of the Sup'Biotech.
